title: Private browsing doesn't use dark theme
content:
Bug 513418 suggests that private browsing windows are meant to use a dark theme, like Chrome, but this doesn't appear to be the case. Without this it's hard for me to quickly tell the difference between a normal window and a private window.

Is this an intentional change, or is a bug preventing private windows from using a dark theme?
creator: sersorrel

title: "Unable to connect" message
content: Using current Firefox (84.0.2) on an iMac desk computer. Since Apple put out their recent upgrade to OS Big Sur (2019 ~Nov?), Firefox keeps dropping its internet connection. Works for a session, but when I come back a few hours later I see "Unable to connect..." Restarting always gets it back to start another session. But rebooting several times every day gets old. When Firefox is on the blink, Safari browser works fine, no problem. Connection is there. But my fullest set of bookmarks is in Firefox, so I'd rather use Firefox. Even more strange: Safari and Firefox both continue to work on my wife's desktop same iMac, no problem, just not Firefox on mine. Found help article "Firefox can't load websites but other browsers can" (https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/firefox-cant-load-websites-other-browsers-can), went through every step to troubleshoot. No go, still drops. Contacted Apple support and they were flummoxed. Any ideas?
creator: prainbow

title: Appears like a google search on Firefox
content: Why does it look like I am still using google to search the internet even though I downloaded Firefox in an attempt to use it as my search engine?
creator: judygarner777

title: How to improve combability with modern websites on Firefox 3.5.5
content:
Hi all,

Currently running Firefox 3.5.5 on Ubuntu Netbook Remix 9.04

Have not been able to find a way to update to an even slightly newer version of the Firefox browser. Upgrading the OS to a supported Linux distribution is impossible with this device.

With this, what can be done to improve the browsing experience of the currently installed Firefox version, 3.5.5? 90% of websites are inaccessible due to SSL_ERROR_NO_CYPHER_OVERLAP, and the sites that do connect will have breakages.

Thanks
creator: kotire4815

title: My default firefox search engine is Wikipedia. I cannot reset it from preferences -> search
content: My default search engine is Wikipedia. I cannot reset it from preferences -> search. There were two posts just like mine back in 2013. The solutions to those posts (2 links) have expired.

title: Firefox slow to load.
content: Firefox slow to load, 20-30 seconds. Appears is opening more than one instance with a single click. When it does load it sometimes comes up with the last page I had open even tough I closed it out properly. Sometimes get error msg that must close out 2nd Firefox before can start Firefox but saying yes results in the current open window closing. This started yesterday and the latest version of Firefox was automatically installed yesterday? Window 7. Cleared cash. Disabled all add on's etc. No help. Close out Firefox and Task Mngr show no Firefox running. Start Firefox and Task mngr shows four/five Firefox running. This started yesterday and the latest version of Firefox was automatically updated yesterday. Any ideas.
creator: waltslagle

title: firefox logs me out after closing the app.
content: Recently I have an issue with Firefox logging me out of Firefox when I close it. Can someone please help with this?

title: Folders dont appear in bookmark search
content: Steps to reproduce Ctrl+Shift+O Right click->new folder...->Name it "ass"->Add Click on "Search Bookmarks" type "ass" no results

title: lišta záložek - tl.Ostatní záložky
content: Jak se zbavit nového tlačítka "Ostatní záložky" na liště záložek? Zabírá místo a skrývá záložky co jsem měl nastavené přesně na šíři mého zobrazení. Zase novinka úplně k ničemu. Kdyby aspoň šla jednoduše dát pryč. Díky za radu
